title: Overcoming Fear & Trauma While Harnessing Your Power w/ Lewis Howes | The Expert Series
itunes:title: Overcoming Fear & Trauma While Harnessing Your Power w/ Lewis Howes | The Expert Series
description:
On this week's episode of The Expert Series, Rob Dial enters "The School of Greatness" and sits down with Lewis Howes, an American author, entrepreneur, and former professional Arena League football player. Rob and Lewis have an in-depth conversation about overcoming challenges in life, such as fear, by harnessing the power within you. 

--
